name: FNF Radio Mod (Vs Omar)
description:
WASD or Arrow keys

when cutscenes are playing, make sure to press any key after the dialogue

i thought it would be funny to add that sign mechanic from tricky mod so i did. only difference is it appears every 10-15 seconds and it's a microphone with a halo.

this mod has really unfair charting, look out

hitting notes only counts if it's perfect hits or just hold the keybinds.
